thread.title: Cara Delevingne Sports Lip Ring at Chanel Exhibition Party With Girlfriend St. Vincent
thread.title_full: Cara Delevingne Sports Lip Ring at Chanel Exhibition Party With Girlfriend St. Vincent

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Cara Delevingne Sports Lip Ring at Chanel Exhibition Party With Girlfriend St. Vincent
text:
Comments The British beauty showed off a flashy accessory on her lower lip during her appearance at the Chanel exhibition party at London's Saatchi gallery on Monday, October 12. 
Cara Delevingne showed off a new accessory during her appearance at the Chanel exhibition party at London's Saatchi gallery on Monday, October 12. The British beauty wore a new lip ring for the occasion. The 23-year-old model looked stunning in a ballerina-inspired ensemble. Cara wore a black sleeveless dress and matching heel sandals. She put her hair into curls piled atop her head. She completed her look with choker featuring classic Chanel pearl embellishment, red lipstick and lip ring on the front and center of her lower lip. Cara was joined by her girlfriend St. Vincent who came later in the evening. The 33-year-old musician looked glamorous in a black lacey dress featuring plunging neckline and thigh-high slit. To complete her look, she wore a fury jacket and black-and-white backless loafers while toting a black handbag. The " Paper Towns " actress took to Instagram to share a snap featuring some images of her stunning look at the star-studded event. The snap showed Cara striking some poses in front of the exhibition's backdrop. A caption for the snap read, "Thank you @chanelofficial for a wonderful night X." Foto kiriman Cara Delevingne (@caradelevingne) pada Okt 13, 2015 pada 6:26 PDT During the exhibition, Cara helped celebrate the launch of the French fashion brand's new Mademoiselle Prive showcase, expected to be the most exciting fashion event of the season. In addition to Cara and St. Vincent, other celebrities in attendance included Rita Ora , model Daisy Lowe , Lily Allen and Johnny Depp 's daughter Lily-Rose Depp .
